Package coldbox.system.web.services

Class Summary
BaseService A ColdBox base internal service
DebuggerService This is the service that powers the ColdBox Debugger
ExceptionService The ColdBox exception service
HandlerService This is the main Coldbox Handler service
InterceptorService The coldbox interceptor service
LoaderService The application and framework loader service
ModuleService I oversee and manage ColdBox modules
PluginService The coldbox plugin service
RequestService This service takes care of preparing and creating request contexts
